sentences.sContent: If you ask me when, I have no idea.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you ask me when, I have no idea.
sentences.sCn: 要问我要到何时的话，我当然也是不知道的啦。

sentences.sContent: They have no idea where they are, no idea what [US] state they are in.
sentences.sContent_eng: They have no idea where they are, no idea what [US] state they are in.
sentences.sCn: 他们不知道自己人在哪里，也不知道自己在[美国]的哪一州。
